name: career-transition-portfolio
description: A comprehensive platform for managing career transitions and building developer portfolios

scripts.build: npm ci --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm ci --prefix server && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.client:build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.server:build: cd server && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment!'
scripts.test: npm run server:test && npm run client:test
scripts.test:coverage: npm run server:test:coverage && npm run client:test:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run server:lint && npm run client:lint
scripts.format: npm run server:format && npm run client:format
scripts.format:check: npm run server:format:check && npm run client:format:check

author: Career Transition Developer
